docPage.title: FullscreenModal

onClose.name: onClose
onClose.description: onClose callback to be called on `Fullscreen Modal` close

type.name: function
type.value: ((event?: Event | MouseEvent<HTMLElement, MouseEvent> | undefined, reason?: string | undefined) => void) | undefined

headerOptions.name: headerOptions

header.name: header
header.description:
header component to be used as modal header.
close button is not part of header so it will not be replaced.

footerOptions.name: footerOptions

footer.name: footer
footer.description: footer component to be used as modal footer.

children.name: children
children.description: Element to be rendered as modal body.

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
